project.name: CastingKart Financial Master Planner
project.description: Investor-grade financial planning tool for startups
project.theme_strategy: Primary Light Mode (Trust/Paper) with Secondary Dark Mode (Pro/Terminal)

headings.usage: Page titles, Section headers, KPI values

modes.dashboard: Grid: 4 columns. Key Metrics (Top) -> Charts (Middle) -> Tables (Bottom)

visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-lg (8px) for inputs, rounded-xl (12px) for cards
visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on sidebar/navigation for tactile feel

motion.data_visualization: CountUp animation for numbers, smooth chart transitions

inputs.slider: Use Shadcn Slider for growth rates/percentages. Style: Minimal track, solid thumb.
inputs.select: Use for discrete choices (e.g., 'Business Model Type').

display.card: Flat, bordered, no shadow by default. Hover adds shadow-md.
display.table: Dense, tabular data. Alternating row colors (zebra striping) optional for readability.
display.kpi_card: Big Number (JetBrains Mono) + Trend Indicator (Green/Red arrow).

images.description: Modern geometric building facade, conveys structure and stability.
Abstract architectural pattern, clean and professional.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add 'Manrope' and 'JetBrains Mono' via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. SETUP THEME: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Swiss Financial Trust' palette.
3. BUILD LAYOUT: Create a 'DashboardLayout' component with a sidebar and top bar.
4. MASTER INPUTS: Build the 'Master Input Screen' first. It is the heart of the app. Use a sticky sidebar for inputs if possible.
5. CHARTS: Implement Recharts with the specified color palette. Ensure tooltips are styled.
6. EXPORT: Plan for 'Export to Excel' button in the top right of every view.
7. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to all inputs (e.g., 'input-growth-rate', 'slider-churn').
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients on backgrounds. Keep it flat and clean.
Use 'tabular-nums' class for all financial data to ensure alignment.
Negative numbers should be in Red and in parentheses: (₹1,000).
Do not use 'Inter' for Headings. Use 'Manrope'.
Ensure high contrast for text (Slate-900 on White).
